description: Boolean Actuator Driver Command. The boolean actuator actor reports when it has sent an actuation command to its driver so that the SCADA can add this to information to be sent up to the AtomicTNode.

SpaceheatName.description: Lowercase words separated by periods, where the word characters can be alphanumeric or a hyphen and the first word starts with an alphabet character.

Bit.description: The value must be the integer 0 or the integer 1. Will not attempt to first interpret as an integer. For example, 1.3 will not be interpreted as 1 but will raise an error.

ReasonableUnixTimeMs.description: An integer reflecting unix time in MILLISECONDS between midnight Jan 1 2000 and midnight Jan 1 3000 UTC
